title: Construction of magnetic MoS2/NiFe2O4/MIL-101(Fe) hybrid nanostructures for separation of dyes and antibiotics from aqueous media
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11037-11056
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00505H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mehri Moradi-Bieranvand, Saeed Farhadi, Abedin Zabardasti, Farzaneh Mahmoudi
A novel MoS2/NiFe2O4/MIL-101(Fe) ternary magnetic nanocomposite was fabricated for the adsorptive removal of dyes and drugs from water.
